接口 QCloudSigner

  • 所有已知实现类:

    Created by wjielai on 2017/9/21.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void sign(QCloudHttpRequest request, QCloudCredentials credentials)
      Sign the given request with the given set of credentials.

    • 方法详细资料

      • sign

        void sign(QCloudHttpRequest request,
          QCloudCredentials credentials)
   throws QCloudClientException
        Sign the given request with the given set of credentials. Modifies the passed-in request to apply the signature.
        参数:
        request - The request to sign.
        credentials - The credentials to sign the request with.
        抛出:
        QCloudClientException
